title: Tamir Rice would still be alive if police used binoculars: Letter to the Editor
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Cleveland Heights - Today 
Tamir Rice's shooting justified? Maybe. But it easily could have been avoided if the responding officers had one vital piece of equipment. N...
